title: Statesville, North Carolina
summary: Statesville is a city in and the county seat of Iredell County, North Carolina, United States, and it is part of the Charlotte metropolitan area.[5] Statesville was established in 1789 by an act of the North Carolina Legislature.[6] The population was recorded as 95 in the 1800 Census.[7] The population was 24,532 at the time of the 2010 census,[8] and was estimated at 27,528 in 2019.[9]
